metadata.title: CVE-2024-5651 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in fence agents that rely on SSH/Telnet. Thisvulnerability can allow a Remote Code Execution (RCE) primitive bysupplying an arbitrary command to execute in the --ssh-path/--telnet-patharguments. A low-privilege user, for example, a user with developer access,can create a specially crafted FenceAgentsRemediation for a fence agentsupportingÂ  --ssh-path/--telnet-path arguments to execute arbitrarycommands on the operator's pod. This RCE leads to a privilege escalation,first as the service account running the operator, then to another serviceaccount with cluster-admin privileges.

criterions.comment: fence-agents package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
